original_text: Listen to the Lord's message, you people who are alive today: ‘People of Israel, why do you not trust me? Have I become like a desert for you? Have I become a dark and dangerous land for you to live in? No! But you say, “We are free to go where we like. We do not need to serve you any more.” Listen to the Lord's message, you people who are alive today: ‘People of Israel, why do you not trust me? Have I become like a desert for you? Have I become a dark and dangerous land for you to live in? No! But you say, “We are free to go where we like. We do not need to serve you any more.” Listen to the Lord's message, you people who are alive today: ‘People of Israel, why do you not trust me? Have I become like a desert for you? Have I become a dark and dangerous land for you to live in? No! But you say, “We are free to go where we like. We do not need to serve you any more.” Listen to the Lord's message, you people who are alive today: ‘People of Israel, why do you not trust me? Have I become like a desert for you? Have I become a dark and dangerous land for you to live in? No! But you say, “We are free to go where we like. We do not need to serve you any more.” Listen to the Lord's message, you people who are alive today: ‘People of Israel, why do you not trust me? Have I become like a desert for you? Have I become a dark and dangerous land for you to live in? No! But you say, “We are free to go where we like. We do not need to serve you any more.” Listen to the Lord's message, you people who are alive today:
korean_text: 너희 이 세대여 여호와의 말을 들어 보라 내가 이스라엘에게 광야가 되었었느냐 캄캄한 땅이 되었었느냐 무슨 이유로 내 백성이 말하기를 우리는 놓였으니 다시 주께로 가지 아니하겠다 하느냐

sentences.original_text: you people who are alive today
why do you not trust me?
Have I become like a desert for you?
Have I become a dark and dangerous land
We are free to go where we like
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 원하는 곳으로 자유롭게 갈 수 있다

sentences.original_text: We do not need to serve you any more
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 당신을 섬길 필요가 없다
